name: drug-data-collection
description: A local application for collecting and managing drug data

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run seed && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nodemon server.js
scripts.build:ncc: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod ncc build server.js -o dist
scripts.build:pkg:macos:arm: npm run package:unix && cd dist && npm install -g pkg && pkg index.js --output start-macos --targets latest-macos-arm64 --config build-config.json && rimraf index.js && rimraf build-config.json && zip -r dist-macos.zip .
scripts.build:pkg:linux: npm run package:unix && cd dist && npm install -g pkg && pkg index.js --output start-linux --targets latest-linux-x64 --config build-config.json && rimraf index.js && rimraf build-config.json && zip -r dist-linux.zip .
scripts.build:pkg:win: npm run package:win && cd dist && npm install -g pkg && pkg index.js --output start-win --targets latest-win-x64 --config build-config.json && rimraf index.js && rimraf build-config.json && Compress-Archive -Path (Get-Location)\* -DestinationPath (Get-Location)\dist-win.zip
scripts.package:win: npm run build:ncc && xcopy /E /I public dist\public && copy .env.example dist\.env && npm run seed && copy abx-data.sqlite dist\ && copy build-config.json dist\
scripts.package:unix: npm run build:ncc && cp -r public dist/ && cp .env.example dist/.env && npm run seed && cp abx-data.sqlite dist/ && cp build-config.json dist/
scripts.build:gyp: npx node-gyp configure && npx node-gyp build
